channel.title: Abouts on Puneet's Notes On Data & Software Engineering

item.title: Me in a Nutshell!
item.description: Back when I left university, I already knew I was heading for a career in technology. After building my first website back in 2000 and getting instant gratification and praise - I was hooked! Fast forward two decades, and my passion to build things and technology, is undiminished. Albeit, now I have moved on to bigger challenges such as building teams, platform migration, PCI, database architecture, process implementation, agile coaching and team management.
